content:
Hello! I tried to work on the following issues:

  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/47112
  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/26719
    I played with some local changes to let rustc write to stdout if -o -or options like --emit llvm-ir=- are specified. My changes seem to work but I'm not sure if this requires an RFC. I see that in this document:
    https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/blob/master/compiler_changes.md
    it says an RFC is needed if it's Adding, removing, or changing a stable compiler flag, so I guess an RFC is needed?
I guess that might only require a MCP
